constituent: easy, sun, day, knot, piglet’s tail
koohiiStory1: The sun is not an easy place to get to.
koohiiStory2: Under the sun, it is easy to untie a knot. Under a pitch-dark sky, it is knot so easy.
readingExamples: 易者 (えきしゃ), 貿易 (ぼうえき), 不易 (ふえき), 易しい (やさ.しい)
